author: veithen

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1857 Do not encode the resource path when used as the
returnTo path (this is done by the OpenID library). Likewise decoding
is not needed either. But before redirecting to the final target after
validating the OpenID response we have to include the request
parameters to save them (from the first request)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix warnings about missing AC_LANG_SOURCE with autoconf 2.68; tested also
Kudos to Philip Martin for pointing me at final bit needed to fix this.
Wrap AC_{PREPROC,COMPILE,LINK}_IFELSE source argument with AC_LANG_SOURCE.
